channel.title: Posts on Carolina Camassa
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Carolina Camassa

item.title: Why you should stop writing on Medium already
item.description: I read articles on Medium almost every day. I owe a lot ok my personal knowledge to that platform, but here’s what I think: If you know how to program, even just a little, and you write semi-regularly on Medium, you should stop doing that and open your own blog instead.

item.title: A curated list of data learning resources for the quarantine
item.description: It’s March 14th 2020, and this week my country has come to a stop to because of the Covid-19 virus outbreak.

item.title: Creating an interactive Flask app for exoplanet classification
item.description: I’ve recently stumbled upon this interesting dataset about exoplanets, planets outside our galaxy. There is a lot of ongoing research on this topic, and scientists are making hypothesis on which - if any - of these planets could be considered habitable from the information we’ve gathered about them.
